attributes.comment:
My name is Xalimo Shekhey and I want to be a United States citizen. I feel as
though this country is my home and I feel safe here. My children are U.S. citizens
and I also want to be a citizen here.
I have heard that the USCIS will possibly be raising the cost of the citizenship
application. This frightens me because the application is already difficult for me to
afford and if the price increases I will not know how I will be able to afford it.
Sometimes I feel as though I don't know what to do, also because there is no one
who offers to help me pay this fee. You should consider helping the low-income
people and help them find/get better jobs so they can afford to pay the fee.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Xalimo Shekley
